legal_citations: Supply of Goods and Services Act 1982
Late Payment of Commercial Debts (Interest) Act 1998

content.title: SERVICE AGREEMENT
key_sections: 1. SERVICES: [DESCRIPTION]. Performed with reasonable skill and care.
2. FEES: Â£[AMOUNT] plus VAT. Payment within [DAYS] days. Late payment interest at 8% above Bank of England base rate (statutory right).
4. IP: [Pre-existing IP retained. New IP: [CUSTOMER/SUPPLIER] owns.]
5. LIABILITY: Limited to [CAP - e.g., fees paid in 12 months]. No limit for death/injury, fraud, or breach of statutory implied terms.
6. TERMINATION: For breach (30 days' cure), insolvency, or convenience ([NOTICE]).
7. DATA PROTECTION: Parties comply with UK GDPR. [IF PROCESSING: Data Processing Agreement attached.]
9. GOVERNING LAW: English law. Exclusive jurisdiction.
